episodes.title: System
episodes.description: Carmy attempts to retrain the employees of The Original Beef of Chicagoland, but is faced with resistance; in need of back-up, he brings on a talented young chef to help.

episodes.title: Hands
episodes.description: A surprise health inspection reveals the cracks in the restaurant's foundation. Carmy goes head-to-head with Richie.

episodes.title: Brigade
episodes.description: Carmy attends Al-Anon. Sydney struggles to gain the respect of the staff.

episodes.title: Dogs
episodes.description: Carmy and Richie cater a kid's birthday party. Tina and Sydney work together while Marcus makes donuts.

episodes.title: Sheridan
episodes.description: Things go wrong in the kitchen. Sydney finds solutions.

episodes.title: Ceres
episodes.description: Richie notices the neighborhood is changing. Sugar and Carmy clean up the office.

episodes.title: Review
episodes.description: A bad day in the kitchen causes tensions to rise.

episodes.title: Braciole
episodes.description: Things get out of control. Carmy is faced with a decision.

episodes.title: Beef
episodes.description: Faced with the reality of opening a new restaurant, the crew must make a plan.

episodes.title: Pasta
episodes.description: The crew splits up to work towards their new vision.

episodes.description: Sydney searches Chicago for culinary inspiration.

episodes.title: Forks

episodes.title: Bolognese
episodes.description: The crew awaits a do-or-die fire suppression test.

episodes.title: Omelette
episodes.description: Final preparations are made for The Bear's first service.

episodes.title: The Bear
episodes.description: Friends & Family night at The Bear.

episodes.title: Tomorrow
episodes.description: The next day and the days that led to it.

episodes.title: Next
episodes.description: Carmy sets a new standard.

episodes.title: Doors
episodes.description: The staff slogs through a month of service.

episodes.title: Violet
episodes.description: Sydney gets a new apartment. Marcus finds inspiration.

episodes.title: Children
episodes.description: The Computer gives The Bear its odds.

episodes.title: Napkins
episodes.description: Tina looks for a new opportunity.

episodes.title: Legacy
episodes.description: The restaurant is out of C-Folds. Sydney is presented with an opportunity.

episodes.title: Ice Chips
episodes.description: Sugar finds support in an unexpected place.

episodes.title: Apologies
